description: Write a function that checks if a `hostname` consists only of digits (e.g., '123456'), which is sometimes used to bypass IP regex. Note: this should return 0 for a valid IP '1.2.3.4'. Example (True): is_hostname_numeric("123456789") -> 1. Example (False): is_hostname_numeric("example.com") -> 0. Example (False): is_hostname_numeric("127.0.0.1") -> 0.
